DOC.detailed_description: Many African-Americans Latinos diabetes achieve recommend goal normal blood sugar , blood pressure , cholesterol level , place high risk complication . This study evaluate impact novel intervention design improve lifestyle behavior medication adherence , intensify therapy reach goal . The first component intervention include clinic-based pharmacist disease management program . The program include detailed patient assessment , physician-approved treatment plan , patient education support service enhance medication adherence . In addition , program include intensification medication therapy improve blood sugar , blood pressure , cholesterol level reach recommend goal . The second component intervention include health promoter ( HPs ) , community-based lay health worker . Health promoter commonly find minority community provide assistance individual overcome language , cultural , barrier conventional health care service . They may provide autonomy support solve problem related medication adherence barrier . Furthermore , health promoter may complement pharmacist activity improve access medication , assist continuity care provider , monitor response therapy , reinforce educational message . The propose study determine whether addition health promoter clinic base pharmacist service delivery improve care . The study involve recruitment 300 African-American Latino adult uncontrolled diabetes University Illinois Medical Center Chicago randomization one two group : ( 1 ) pharmacist management ( Pharm ) 12 month ; ( 2 ) pharmacist management HP support ( Pharm+HP ) 12 month . Cross-over occur 12 month Pharm group intensify addition HP support HP support phase Pharm+HP group ass maintenance . The specific aim include : ( 1 ) To evaluate effectiveness Pharm+HP compare Pharm alone diabetes behavior ( include healthy eating , physical activity , medication adherence ) , hemoglobin A1c , blood pressure , LDL-cholesterol level ; ( 2 ) To evaluate maintenance improve diabetes behavior well clinical outcome phase HP support Pharm+HP group year 1 ; ( 3 ) To evaluate intensification offer add HP one year Pharm alone ; ( 4 ) To evaluate cost cost-effectiveness Pharm+HP Pharm alone .
